sentences.en: Compare tell, order, instruct , direct, command.
sentences.cn: 试比较tell 、 order、instruct 、 direct 、 command这五个词.

sentences.en: Eva went straight to the hotel, as instructed (= as she had been told ).
sentences.cn: 伊娃按照指示径直去了宾馆。

sentences.en: Greater effort is needed to instruct children in road safety.
sentences.cn: 在指导儿童注意道路安全方面需要更大的努力。

sentences.en: I seriously prayed to God that he would enable me to instruct savingly this poor savage.
sentences.cn: 我就恳切祷告上帝,祁求他使我有办法教导这个可怜的野人.

sentences.en: I was instructed that £20,000 had been paid into my account.
sentences.cn: 我得到通知两万英镑已存入我的账户。

sentences.en: I'll instruct my lawyer immediately to send you a check for $ 5,000.
sentences.cn: 我会通知我的律师马上寄给你$5000的支票.

sentences.en: I'll instruct them to leave you there with Connie.
sentences.cn: 我要指示他们,让你同康妮一道留在家里.

sentences.en: Instruct means giving practicalinformation or knowledge, especially to groups of trainees ( eg soldiers or nurses )
sentences.cn: instruct指传授实践知识, 特别是针对集体受训者 ( 如士兵或护士 )

sentences.en: It does not pertain to you to instruct him.
It is now necessary to instruct the Throne , in the language of truth.
sentences.cn: 现在必须向我王晓以真情.

sentences.en: Michael finished the brandy in his glass.'send Clemenza in to me. I'll instruct him personally.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔把玻璃杯里的白兰地一饮而尽,然后说: “ 叫克莱门扎到我这儿来, 我要亲自给他下达指示.

sentences.en: My job is to instruct her in English.
So nowyou are to instruct me in games of chance?
sentences.cn: 那么你现在就在教我这场投机的游戏?

sentences.en: The college will need an additional teacher to instruct the boys in cooking.
sentences.cn: 这所技术学校需要增加一名教员来向学生传授烹调技术.

sentences.en: The old workers instruct the young workers not only in words but in deeds.
sentences.cn: 老工人对青年工人不仅言传而且身教.

sentences.en: Two things instruct man about his whole nature; instinct and experience.
sentences.cn: 有两件东西教益于人的整个本性, 一是本能,一是经验.

sentences.en: We should instruct the passengers what customs regulations are.
sentences.cn: 我们应该向乘客说明海关规则是什么.

sentences.en: You can instruct your bank to allow a third party to remove money from your account.
sentences.cn: 你可以通知银行，允许第三方从你的账户取款。

words.tran_cn: 指令，命令；指示；教导；用法说明

trans.tran_en: to teach someone something, or show them how to do something

trans.tran_cn: 教，讲授，教导，指导，通知，命令
trans.tran_en: to officially tell someone what to do
